patthana16.22:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa,
patthana16.22:1.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.22:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ nocittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa,
patthana16.22:2.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa. (Ete saṅkhittā, dukattayaṁ cittadukasadisaṁ.)
